text: So many great memories of playing this game over and over again, and that rumble pak really enhanced the experience because you could really feel the impact of every hit and crashes. Rumble almost feels like a given now, but back then it had that wow factor. Just a great, fun game.

author: Chillii

text:
I'm a little surprised you haven't posted this song until now.

God, this is such a good theme. I have this weird opinion of liking this original rendition of the Star Wolf theme over the Star Fox Assault version (I just liked the faster pace, and I just like Star Fox 64 more overall). I love how you're guaranteed to hear this song in a given Star Fox run (given you don't Game Over early), and I have so many memories of learning to fight Star Wolf, only to realize there's a harder version of Star Wolf on Venom II. That fight is fun once you get the hang of it (unless you end up in a crappy situation, like taking them on with only a Single Laser... bonus points if you have no wingmates remaining) :P
author: myohel0

text: I'm pretty much desperate for good renditions or remixes of Star Fox 64 tracks, because they always seem to lack the punch of the melody or the tempo of the percussion. The sense of urgency and that personality of the soundtrack just can't be imitated, it seems.
